TopicTitle: Addons that are good for "Cheating" and "Messing around"

Articles.Content:
Hey guys! I like to mess around a lot in KSP. Is there any mod that you can cheat or mess around with? (I already have HyperEdit, so is there anything else?

Thanks!
Alt F12 will give you unlimited fuel, unlimited rcs, and a few other things. No mod needed.
